The Panxian Changxing Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of 落脉穴村 in Panxian County, Liupanshui City, Guizhou Province

operators: Guizhou Bangda Energy Development Co Ltd
owners: Guizhou Bangda Energy Development Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated and owned by Guizhou Bangda Energy Development Co Ltd.
